inn1.comm: straightens as it is floated up on a fuller length, is defended off the front foot
moves forward, opens the face and runs the length ball to third man
beauty, more zip and bounce on this as it holds its line outside of stump, Mangal prods from the crease and is beaten
stays on the crease again, allows this good length ball to straighten and plays it out
floats this one in now, but the angle takes it down the leg side
wider now outside off stump, and easily left alone
this one swings in appreciably, well played too, as the batsman stays on the crease to nudge it to the leg side
slight away swing as this pitched good length, but wide enough to be left alone
bowled much fuller, swinging away again, another leave
angled in full at 136 kph, and flies past a diving keeper down the leg side
straightens late as it is bowled fuller around off stump, pushed away off the front foot
nicely done, Shami sends this one onto the pad, and is flicked away behind square leg, timed well enough to beat fine leg easily
digs in the bouncer now after the boundary, and batsman ducks immediately
Shami sends another one down the leg side here, from a good length, this time it does not rear up after pitching and keeper takes it comfortably
lovely stroke, he's got on his toes to this short of a length ball and punched it crisply through the covers
now Bhuvneshwar starts the over with a harmless length ball angled into the pads, and is flicked with a flourish, well clear of the keeper
corrects the line, sends it widish outside off, it swings away late, but the line makes it an easy leave
good one, makes him play with one angled in just outside off, and it then swerves away late to zip past the edge
has him thinking about the outswinger as he moves across tentatively in the crease, this one carries on straight, is played off a thick inside edge
takes a step forward to this gentle outswinger and shoulders arms
digs it in short, gets it to climb onto the right-hander, who does well to get on his toes and bring it down softly
and one more delivery sprayed down the leg side, DK does well to stop it with a dive
much better one, back of a length just outside off, forced off the back foot to point
superb stroke, this is not driving length at all, but Noor Ali has reacted so sharply that he's timed the punch well enough to beat short extra's dive, four as soon as he achieves that
this one holds its line outside off now and he ends up playing inside the line with a closed bat face
and again, this time it is a fuller one, and Noor Ali needs no more invitation to step forward and crash it behind point, opening the face of the bat late
that hardly got up, bounced well in front of the keeper as it was left alone outside off, DK cannot stop it
there have been a few of these already, this one's taken off from a good length, and jagged away and bounced past the outside edge
good length ball played out to point from the crease
length ball pushed back down the pitch
width given, and he uses that to guide the ball to third man
doesn't really need to do this with the start they've got, walks down the pitch outside off, this one comes in, and he is hit high on the pad
Shami's got the breakthrough, can't say he's earned it, Mangal saw width on this back of a length ball and went hard at it, only to chop it on to the stumps
141 kph length ball left alone, and it bounces well in front of the keeper
yet another one sent down the leg side this afternoon by India
corrects the line, bowls it outside off, left alone
good delivery, this comes in from just outside off stump, batsman does well to play it softly from the crease
moves forward to a pitched up ball and eases it to point
moves into the pad from a good length and is sent down to fine leg
another gift onto the pad and it is tucked away behind square, fine leg has a job and runs around to cut it off
punched to backward point, didn't really time it
easily done, angled in down the pad and picked away to fine leg
slashed and flies just past the second slip, it was moving away wide outside off and he went after it
taken from around off and worked into the gap at midwicket, he wants a second but a dive from Mishra prevents that
comes slowly off the pitch and is played out to the leg side
another bottom edge but this ball was much fuller compared to the one that Mangal chopped on, and Noor Ali just drags it into the crease as he attacks it
this was set to come in, but it straightened instead off the seam after pitching, and turned into a ripper that zoomed past the outside edge
played out to backward point from the crease
Rayudu dives at extra cover and half-stops another strong back-foot punch from Noor Ali
worked behind square leg for a single
didn't get up as much as he was expecting it to from back of a length, he trotted out after jabbing it behind point, the throw came in and missed, he would have been in anyway
leans forward and pushes a pitched up ball down the track
moves across in the crease and defends a fuller one
defends a good length delivery around off stump
just back of driving length, played out to the off side
tight over from Bhuvneshwar, pitched up ball around off pushed back
lovely from Noor Ali again, not much width on this ball, it even came in, but Noor Ali stays calm, opens the face and times it behind point, no chance for third man
now he walks down the track and chips this one from off stump in the air behind square leg
sets himself up for the back-foot punch again, is in the air as he plays the stroke, didn;t have much room and mistimes it
this one is pitched up to off stump now, he reacts just in time to keep it out
beaten, this moved away from back of a length, he followed the line trying the punch again, but could not get to it
nice front-foot drive to extra cover off this pitched up ball to end the over
leans forward to this full one and guides it to point
with a man at short extra cover, he does not go after this pitched up ball and carefully pushes it away
good length ball played out wristily to square leg
this was there to be hit, full and wide, he reaches it with ease and dismisses it through extra cover
comes forward and across and works it towards the non-striker, could not time it
similar delivery, same result, but this time he pushes from the crease
an appeal for leg-before first ball as he misses the paddle to a tossed up one that came in, umpire Bowden shakes his head
pushes a flighted one to the off side
tossed up higher and right on the stumps, blocked tightly
has a drive as Mishra gives it air just outside off, slight turn takes the thick edge, Rahane gives chase and pulls it back at third man
nudged off the front foot to square leg
tossed up and bowled slightly quicker and fuller, defended

and he strikes first ball, typical Jadeja delivery, full, angled in, pitching middle, no turn, batsman struck on the pad on the forward push and umpire Llong raises the finger immediately, would that have hit leg?
moves a bit inside the line and pushes a fullish one to long off for one
second one for Jadeja, and this one has turned a bit and bounced sharply, it hits the glove as Noor Ali pushes forward to defend, and captain at slip does the rest
played to square leg off the front foot
flashes at this one outside off, and is fortunate the inside edge does not clatter into the stumps, goes past them to backward short leg
tossed up googly, he does well to not commit, and plays it out from the crease as it spins in
fuller one placed wide of extra cover for a single
opens the face to one pushed across and takes a single even as the fielder runs in from extra cover
hurries onto him as it straightens, he goes back and works it square to leg
sharp turn in from outside off and he is hit on the pad, outside the line of off
comes forward and defends safely this time
Jadeja produces another edge as batsman presses forward but this time it runs past the lone slip
fuller one pushed to extra cover

Jadeja continues to pick up wickets, this is a nothing ball, a half tracker, but Stanikzai winds up and pulls it straight into the hands of mid on, hit it off the toe end of the bat and it looped to the fielder
pushes forward and softly guides this to point
pushed down the track off the front foot
straightens as it is angled onto middle and leg, bat in front of pad as he smothers it
was there some bat or glove on this, does not seem to be on replays, it pops up off the pad, DK runs for it, dives but it eludes him
fuller outside off, driven to mid off
spins in sharply from round the stumps, but is still wide enough to be cut
lovely, tossed up teasingly at 79 kph, pitches on the stumps, and jags past the uncertain forward prod
swept to short fine leg
comes forward to dead-bat this full delivery around off
in the air for a while as he comes forward and squirts this towards mid off
was looking to work this to leg initially but it ended up going back to the bowler
dropped by Kohli at slip, he drops way too many catches Kohli, full delivery guided straight to him, and he messes up
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot

strikes first ball too, tosses it up generously from round the stumps, Najibullah has a crack at it, substitute Binny settles under the skier at mid off, and tumbles to the ground after taking a high catch
whips a full delivery through midwicket
with wickets tumbling all around, Shahzad begins with a reverse sweep, picks it from just outside off stump and puts it away behind point
pops up around vacant forward short leg, keeper comes to take it, umpire does not think there was any bat there
defends a tossed up ball safely
neatly played, makes some room and dabs this one from close to off stump to third man
bursts forward to keep out this one around off
slogs and misses now, the bat making an arc above the line of this length ball outside off
quicker one rushing in at 98 kph, he keeps it out towards mid on
backs away to a flatter one and hits it to the sweeper
played away to sweeper cover for a single
he's got hold of this one, got under it and slogged it high and into the empty seats beyond deep midwicket
he's cracked this tossed up ball straight to short extra cover
slower as it is flighted outside off, he plays softly and it runs past the two slips
turning and bouncing close to off stump, defended with soft hands
squirts it off a thick outside edge towards vacant third man, will get only a single as he slips at the non-striker's end
goes back to keep out one that stays a bit low
reaches to a fullish one and pushes it to sweeper cover
defended off the front foot to extra cover
this is down the pad and he's got something on the sweep, the ball runs fine past the keeper
reaches well forward to defend down the pitch
opens the face as he goes back to a quick one and guides it to point
darts it in at 93 kph to the stumps, he squirts it to the off side off a leading edge
fourth for Jadeja, as he gets one to kick just outside off stump, a surprised Nabi can only feather it through to the keeper, who does well to hang on to it to his right
tossed up wide outside off, he reaches it and crashes it to the sweeper
this almost gets through as it turns in, inside edge onto pad
too good, this starts around leg stump and jags across to miss off by quite some distance
and again, spinning away from middle and past the forward prod, India appeal, but there's nothing there
kicks from middle and leg and rushes across him, Shenwari can't do anything about it
fired into the pad, and defended
wants the single as he pushes to the off side but has to abandon the attempt
lunges forward to defend, there is a shout from the bowler
makes some room and cuts to point
bowled fuller and seems to strike the boot as it is angled in, was going down
blocked off the front foot
goes back to a legbreak and works it to midwicket
stays in the crease and cuts with the turn to deep point
much fuller and close to off, pushed back
tossed up high, and is hit hard to sweeper cover
googly, he moves around and nudges it behind square leg
bowled quicker, and pushed back to the bowler
guides a turning one to point, and is not getting the single
not much room, but he;s made some and cut it hard through the small gap at point
squirts it wide of slip off a thick inside edge
lunges forward to defend down the track
tossed up around middle and leg, and nudged through midwicket
90 kph on off stump, defended to the bowler
starts with an 88 kph full one just outside off, is jabbed away to the leg side
backs away and even as it stays low, he cuts behind point
nudged past square leg off the pad
given straight away by umpire Bowden, carrom ball hurries on, Shahzad is struck above the knee roll as he fails to work it to leg, he is not a tall man, and the legs were bent too, gone
squirts this tossed up ball past the slip off the front foot
pushed to short extra cover
pushed down the track off the front foot
swept away in the air behind square leg
quick on the pads, he plays with bat in front and keeps it out
played with an open face to point
some turn and bounce as he bowls this slowly, is played out off the back foot
beats the outside edge with this tossed up ball outside off
overpitched one pushed to extra cover
on the pad and worked straight to square leg
a leading edge off this fuller one to point as he tried to turn it to leg
goes hard at a tossed up ball and flays it past extra cover, it is pulled back just inside the rope
goes straight on towards off and middle and is kept out off the back foot
flatter one outside off pushed to point
bowled a touch slower and pushed to extra cover off the front foot
lunges forward again, bat and pad together to defend to the off side
worked to the left of mid on and they rush across for the single
well done, allows it to come in with the angle, opens the bat face late and defends
turned behind square leg for a single
lots of flight and he attacks it but smashes it straight to extra cover
fuller one played out to the off side
pushed off the front foot and it runs towards vacant third man
pushes a full one softly in front of cover
almost sneaked through as he tried to work a tossed up ball to midwicket, it goes to the bowler instead
eases an overpitched ball past extra cover
tossed up delivery played back softly
flatter one cut hard to deep point
driven hard and straight to the bowler
beats him completely with one that turns and bounces, DK has to take it high to his right, and by that time the slim stumping chance has gone
opens the face and runs this tossed up full ball behind point
turns in and bounces, is played softly off the back foot
fired in flat and is worked away to square leg
full one pushed to short extra cover
straighter one keeps low and is kept out neatly from crashing into off
fired in at 94 kph down the leg side
full on middle and leg, forced to the right of mid on
he's been given by umpire Llong, and Mishra has a wicket finally after beating the bat so many times, tossed up googly, he pushes at it, thin inside edge onto pad and pops gently to slip
pushes a legbreak from the crease to short extra cover
bat well in front of pad to keep out this flighted ball
no clue about this one, it goes the other way from round the stumps, and is miles past the outside edge
plays with extreme caution and nudges to the leg side
lunges forward and across to keep out this one and survive the over
tossed up into the pad, and runs fine, was he offering a shot, umpire thinks so and signals leg bye
full delivery played down the track
pops up through vacant forward short leg as he pushes forward
another one pops up to where forward short leg would have been
fuller one pushed towards extra cover
sharp turn for Jadeja, and batsman is hit high on the pad, headed down leg easily
this could have been tight, they went for the single after a nudge to leg, throw bounced a tough high for the keeper and by the time he gathered it, the batsman had made it
played out to point
superb connection on the sweep as he gets it high over fine leg
was there an outside edge here, it turned and bounced on Shenwari, and hit the keeper's glove before falling short of slip, can't be sure from replays
flatter one hit to sweeper cover
tossed up quickish on middle and leg, nudged away
91 kph and full on the pad, he can't do anything with it
makes some room outside leg and slogs this one to deep square leg, does not take the run
spins in to the right-hander from outside leg and is pushed away
changes the stance early and reverse-hits hard, comfortably clears point
full on the pad, clipped to deep midwicket
and first ball, he's been flat-batted down the ground for four, mid off had absolutely no chance with this
hurries and bounces from just short of a length, there is width, he swings at it and misses
fuller one knocked back to the bowler who stops it to his right
Mishra at mid on puts in a clumsy dive to his right but cannot stop the ball as it is forced through midwicket, there is a man in the deep though
another boundary, didn;t seem much more than a hurried jab but it was timed well enough to rush past mid off who was walking forward quickly
beaten by a long way as he pushes forward at a tossed up offbreak
bat in front of pad as he presses forward to smother a fuller one
beaten again, as he plays well inside the line of a spinning offbreak, Kohli thinks there was an edge through to the keeper
and again, too much turn for Shapoor to get some bat on the defensive prod
finally gets some bat on ball as he nudges to leg
change of line works as he fires this carrom ball in quick and full, Shapoor plays for the turn away from him and is caught in front of leg stump, replays show it would have clipped leg
tries a big sweep, but misses as this legbreak spins across sharply and hits him on the body
has a charge and a slog but cannot get it too far, turns down the single
mishit clears extra cover comfortably and this time he takes the single
bends and carts a tossed up googly to deep midwicket
waits for this to turn away and hits it to the sweeper
Mishra beats the bat by a mile again with a big tossed up legbreak
bowls a carrom ball from round the stumps, pitches it outside leg and turns it into the right-hander who plays it back
from outside leg stump again, taken on the pad
nudged to short fine leg
sticking to the same leg-stump line, worked square
sweeps a full and quick one hard and beats backward square leg's dive
full on off and middle, he keeps strike with a single in front of square leg now
swung hard to deep midwicket, and they will come back for the second
sways inside the line of a short ball, looked to be trying to guide it over the keeper initially, but let it go
smashes this full delivery straight to mid on
well done, it is a slower ball, and he's adjusted to dab it behind point and also beaten third man
takes the single off the fifth ball, down to long on
Shami has one delivery at the last man and gets in the yorker, but he does well to dig it out
rolls away off the pad as he fails to work it away square on the leg side
length ball cracked past the bowler, but mid off runs around to field
gets behind the line of this one on the stumps and blocks
beaten by this slower one as he tries to square-drive
calmly defends to short cover
with the field up to prevent the single, he attacks this pitched up ball and lofts it over extra cover to move to 49
tossed up widish outside off, and left alone as it spins and bounces
this one is flatter on the stumps but he gets the bat down in time
beaten as he tries to cut a big turner
moves forward confidently to defend this flighted one
super, huge googly, that came back in so much, and missed everything, batsman, stumps, keeper
comes forward and defends this flatter googly
tries to hit this down the ground but cannot get much bat under it and mistimes it
and again, Bhuvneshwar gets it very full and he cannot time the big drive
gets it away this time, fifty to Shenwari from No 8 as he scythes a full delivery to long off
defends a good length ball off the front foot
bends and squirts this one out to third man
a low full toss hit back to the bowler
defends an offbreak comfortably off the front foot
keeps out at a straighter one safely
allows it to spin in and bounce from outside off and pushes it to the bowler
quick and turns away from the right-hander this time, past the outside edge
and again, this time he attacks the flighted ball, but it spins away and beats him again
maiden 45th over as Dawlat cannot get this full delivery away
very full and right on the stumps, squirted down to long off for no run

Shami has 50 ODI wickets, Shenwari tries to scoop this length ball to fine leg, misses as he gets down on his left knee, is hit on the leg in front of the stumps, and that is it for the Afghanistan innings

inn2.comm: rolls to leg slip off the pad
defended off the front foot
comes forward and defends a gentle offbreak that does not turn much
lovely, straighter one, draws him into playing with some flight and beats the prod
this time there is some turn and bounce and Rahane is hit above the knee roll as he misses with the bat
nudged past short fine leg for a couple
138 kph back of a length ball slapped away to cover
short of a length again, steered to third man for a single
opens the face and guides a short of a length ball to point
leading edge takes it to short extra as he tries to work it to leg
beaten as he pushes off the back foot at one leaving him with the left-armer's angle
pitched up this time, around off, pushed solidly to short extra cover
plays inside the line of a tossed up offbreak, again some turn
this one rushes straight on and he hurriedly jabs it away towards point
gets bat around pad to nudge square to the leg side
cramped for room as he mistimes the back foot punch to extra cover
straightens after being angled in to middle and leg, defended
opens the face as he comes forward to defend to the off side
he pulls a 136 kph shortish delivery in front of square off the front foot, hasn't quite got hold of it,
chops this cut into the ground as he sees this wide one
into the pad with the angle and he works it to short midwicket
nice, Dhawan leans forward and places the drive between cover and backward point
back of a length, into the body, defended down the track
uses the angle into him to tuck it to deep square leg
moves forward and carefully pushes this offbreak to point
guides this neatly but straight to backward point
on leg stump and worked through midwicket for a couple
almost got through, this one was floated up and did not turn, Dhawan escaped with a thick inside edge
jumps out and pushes this away off pad to extra cover
defended off the front foot
eases a pitched up ball to extra cover
defends a good length ball solidly
clipped in the air off the pad but right in the gap at midwicket
that's taken off, 129 kph only but rears up just outside off, Rahane tries to ride it, but it still beats him
length ball rolls behind square leg
turned off the pad past short midwicket, mid on runs after it
turn for Nabi again, but Dhawan runs it towards point and they rush through for the single
full delivery worked down the ground to long on
turned to midwicket
nudged off the front foot, midwicket cuts it off
comes forward to turn this to midwicket
goes back and punches straight back to the bowler
no room to work with, this one's around off stump, Dhawan does well to guide it with timing, but straight to backward point
worked off the pad to deep square leg
overpitched on the pads and he puts it away to the deep square leg boundary
drives smoothly towards mid off and takes the single comfortably
very full and he cannot get much bat on it as he drives hard to mid off
good length ball on the stumps defended to the off side
drives at a one leaving him on the angle, thick outside edge runs in the air to third man
loose, pushes tentatively at a wide one and is beaten
nudges a back of a length ball close to the crease on the leg side for one
well done, Dhawan pushes softly in front of mid off and charges down for the single, makes it easily
good length ball played out to covers
reaches to the pitch of this tossed up ball and drives to wide long off
walks out, and eases it down to long on
goes back to a length ball and works it awkwardly to the leg side, bowler fields
Rahane charges for the single as Dhawan pushes one to the off side, but cover is onto the ball and Rahane has to apply the brakes
flatter one whipped off middle and leg to deep square
walks out once more and keep strike with a single to longon
141 kph and full but directed down the leg side
plenty of width, and Rahane cuts, almost all the way over the deep backward point rope
dabs a short of a length ball out to deep point
right on middle stump from a good length, he guides it to cover
back of a length, guided to sweeper cover from the crease
another well-judged single, Rahane drops this shortish ball behind point, and Dhawan zips through safely even as the throw misses
seemed to stop on him as it moved across from just outside leg, but he does well to pop it t the off side and take another sharp single
tries to carve this through the covers but gets a bottom edge
tossed up ball driven to wide long off
thought of leaving the crease, but stayed put and defended in the end
this time he does come out and picks up one more to long on
he's had trouble with this stroke this series, but gets hold of the forcing whip through midwicket as he goes back
beaten on the cut with a straight and quick one
ending on middle stump, Dhawan does not have room and runs it towards cover
dropped, Dhawan slices this in the air, Shenwari jumps at backward point, gets his hands to it but it does not stick
cramped again and has to push this back to the bowler
moves forward confidently but finds short extra with the drive
sees some width this time and guides it to deep point
tackles this short ball well, swivels and pulls it into the ground square on the leg side
spinning away from Rahane, who makes some room and cuts in the air to deep point
punched solidly past midwicket to long on
comes forward, pushes to vacant cover and takes the single
these two have taken some good singles today, mid off is not sharp enough to prevent Dhawan from charging down after a soft push
a full toss, Dhawan drives, but extra cover's dive saves runs
this rears up and hits the glove, but Rahane has managed to softly drop it fine past the keeper
is late in coming forward to this pitched up ball and mistimes the push to mid on
picks it in the air off the pads, deep square leg runs around
pushed to the off side
ooh, that was a brute, was dug in short and climbed at Dhawan's throat, he somehow managed to fend it away and survive
worked from off stump to midwicket
comes out but is beaten by this flighted one, and takes it on the pad
pushes straight to extra cover
tries the sweep to one going down the leg side, Shahzad appeals for caught behind, umpire signals wide
tries to sweep again, and misses once more, hit on the pad this time
too short, Dhawan waits and thumps it straight to the sweeper
nice, Dhawan squeezes out a drive to this one on middle stump, and places it between extra cover and mid off
good length ball defended, bowler moves to his right to field
runs a pitched up delivery to point
pushes a full one straight back to the bowler
a thick inside edge now square on the leg side
142 kph but down the leg side, but it is a front-foot no-ball first, only the second one of the tournament, Russell Arnold says on air
drags a short ball out to deep midwicket
skips out, gets under the ball and lifts it high over extra cover
another boundary, this time he goes to leg, against the turn, picks it from around off and beats mid on's dive, that will do
wants to cut but there is too much turn for him to time the shot
an outside edge now as he pushes forward, there is no slip, short third man hits the stumps, but Dhawan's running has been superb today, he makes it safely
comes out, misses this one and is hit on the pad
overpitched ball driven hard through covers, and wide of the sweeper
Dhawan takes on mid off once more, he is standing up too now, but Dhawan still makes it with ease, inspite of the direct hit
opens the face to run it to third man, Stanikzai misfields and they take one more
awkwardly plays this out to the leg side
guides a good length ball to point
whips this straight to midwicket
Rahane moves to 49 with another threaded drive through the covers, sweeper does well to dive and save the boundary
worked to midwicket and Dhawan is not getting the single this time
he's blasted this overpitched delivery straight down the ground and hit it too powerfully for any fielder to get close to it
and again, clears the front leg and cracks it to the straight boundary again
tries it a third time, but this one has been flighted a lot more, and he fails to time it
defended off the front foot
not getting it yet, pushes it straight to backward point
comes out and cracks it for cover to make a sharp stop, but his throw is off target and Dhawan will reach fifty before Rahane
opens up and punches a good length from the stumps to sweeper cover
Rahane reaches fifty with a softly pushed single down the ground
leaves the crease but fails to connect as this is angled full across him
hammers this to the sweeper
opens the face and keeps strike with a single to third man
bottom edges onto the pad as he tries to hit this low full toss
drags it short and Rahane puts it away with a pull to the deep forward square leg rope
pushes forward and guides it to point
works it in front of mid on, who fails to pick up the ball to test the batsmen
more a slice than a strike, but all that matters in the end he's got enough on it to clear the straight boundary
has a big slog and hits it to deep midwicket
misses as he wants to work it to square on the leg side
a full toss guided to the sweeper

he's been given leg-before, he's fallen similarly before, walking across and missing the nudge square to the leg side, umpire Bowden sends him back, but replays show the ball would have missed leg stump, now then
turns it with the angle to square leg
moves forward and drives elegantly to extra cover
stays in the crease and steers a length ball to third man
comes forward and runs this one to short third man, who fails to pick it up, Dhawan would have probably been home anyway
hit on the pad as he misses the nudge to leg
superb delivery, Nabi tosses it up, pitches it around off, and has Dhawan feeling for it, the turn beats the prod and Dhawan's had his off stump knocked back
forward neatly to smother this one full around off
guides it to short third man
off the mark with a couple
full delivery pushed to mid on
driven wide of mid off for a single
opens the face and picks up a single behind backward point
defends to point off the front foot
angled in and staying a touch low on off stump, DK keeps it out
comes forward to smother this offbreak
Rohit slithers out and has a swipe, but misses and is hit on the pad
leans forward and across and works it with the spin to long on
reaches to the line as he sees it bowled wide, almost plays on, thick inside edge goes to short fine leg
nudged to midwicket
leans forward to defend a tossed up ball
backs away a touch to a straightish one and cuts it to deep point
drops it softly towards point, keeper goes after it
comes across confidently and smothers the last ball of Nabi's spell
back of a length into the right-hander from round the stumps, steered to third man
hops and defends a shortish ball, cannot get the single as point runs in
drives a pitched up ball wide of mid off for one more
eases forward and picks up a single to third man with an open bat face

Afghanistan are convinced they have DK caught behind, umpire Bowden shakes his head, loud sound as the ball rears up past DK's bottom hand, could only have been an edge, Shahzad threw it up immediately, bowler implored and implored, but Bowden wasn't budging
punched hard but straight to cover
pushed to long off for a single
reaches out to one spinning away wide outside off, and edges it through the keeper's gloves to short third man
left alone outside off
eased down the ground to long off
DK's keeping Afghanistan interested, he pulls this short ball, shouts of 'catch it' as it loops towards mid on, he jumps but it clears him
pushed off the front foot to point
uses the angle into him to work it square on the leg side
almost played on, defends this back of a length ball, it drops into the crease, and bounces over the stumps
turns a pitched up ball to midwicket
presses forward and blocks solidly to the off side
comes out and has a crack at it on the full, but does not manage much timing, it goes straight to mid off
goes back and works it in the air through midwicket
that does it, Rohit eases into a cover drive and ends India's Asia Cup campaign with a bonus point victory
